Definition: In this task you are given a tweet with irony. Classify the type of irony as "polarity", "situational", or "other". "Polarity" is when irony is achieved by inverting the intended sentence. "Situational" is when a situation fails to meet some expectations. "Other" is when the irony is neither polarity nor situational.
